full_summary:
## NSN 20-0058548 Sheet, Metal Tender
### Solicitation Information

#### Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: W8482-231082/A
* Amendment Number: 4
* Publication Date: January 18, 2023
* Closing Date: February 17, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Solicitation Status: Expired

#### Contract Details
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified

#### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for Sheet, Metal items, as outlined below:

* NSN: 20-0058548
* GSIN: N9515 (Plates, Sheets, Strips, Foils, and Leafs)
* Part No.: 316LS.S.SHEET.061X48X120 2B
* Quantity: 200 EA
* Unit of Issue: EA
* Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia

#### Instructions to Bidders

* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name, model, and/or part number, and the NCAGE they are offering.
* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Supporting Documents

The following attachments are available on the Canadabuys website:

* Amendment 001 (January 19, 2023)
* Amendment 002 (January 23, 2023)
* Amendment 003 (January 30, 2023)
* Amendment 004 (February 7, 2023)
* English Notice (January 18, 2023)
* French Notice (January 18, 2023)

#### Point of Contact
Christopher Cauchi
Email: [christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: Not Specified
Fax: Not Specified
Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation adheres to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Regions

* Canada (notice)
* Nova Scotia (delivery) You may use these links. https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/07/642acb
